title: Live and work in our beautiful creative loft spaces! 819 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 819 sq ft | $1800/Month', 'Marbella on Dean', '3036 W Lake St', 'Minneapolis, MN 55416', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Select from a variety of attractive floor plans to find the studio, one or two-bedroom suite that perfectly fits your unique lifestyle.', "Our lofts invite in plenty of natural light with beautiful floor-to-ceiling windows, and in our updated urban apartments you'll enjoy all the modern conveniences you could want.", "While preparing meals in your gourmet-style kitchen, you'll be inspired by your surroundings with elegant granite countertops, smart energy-efficient appliances, and beautiful cherry-wood cabinetry.", "The high ceilings and spacious living area with a cozy gas fireplace create an airy, welcoming atmosphere, and you'll appreciate all the special touches like designer finishes, oversized closets with built-in shelving, contemporary flooring, and having your own private balcony where you can get plenty of fresh air and dine al fresco.", "You'll love having a full-size washer and dryer right in your own home, as well as built-in intrusion alarms to help bring you peace of mind, and individual climate controls to ensure superior comfort.", 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Contemporary Cherry Wood Cabinets', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Gas Fireplaces In Select Units', '● High-Speed Internet Access', '● Individually Climate Controlled', '● Outdoor Patio with Private Entrance', '● Oversized Closets with Shelving', '● Oversized Energy Efficient Insulation and Windows', '● Two and Three Bedroom Townhome Floor Plans', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '● Bike Racks', '● Energy Efficient Environment', '● Fire Protection System', '● Fireside Terrace', '● Free Wi-Fi in Common Areas', '● Internet Cafe', '● Maintenance On-Site', '● Resident Grilling Stations', '● Smoke-Free', '● Cable Ready and High-Speed Internet Access Available', '● Clubroom with Billiards and Table Tennis', '● Fitness Center Open 24 Hours', '● Indoor/Outdoor Pool with Hot Tub and Resort-Style Sundeck', '● Located Just Minutes from Downtown Minneapolis Across from Lake Calhoun and On The Greenway', '● Outdoor Lounge with Fireplace', '● Underground Parking and Flex Reserved Available', '● Walking Distance to Uptown', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: Variable', 'Pets: Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Dogs and Cats Allowed: $200 Deposit.', '$30 Monthly Pet Rent.', '$200 Fee. 2 Pet Limit.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY',
